reference.title: Keystores Backup dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to easily back up one or more keystores to a zip archive.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click (Back Up Keystores) in the Signing and Keys view.

strow.stentry: The archive (zip) file to which you want to back up your keystore file(s). If you select an existing file, that file will be overwritten.
The keystores to be backed up. Select at least one to copy to the archive file.
